channel.title: oneliners on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in oneliners on Alok's Blog

item.title: Linux one liners
item.description: –tags: Useful Linux Packages sudo !! python -m SimpleHTTPServer :w !sudo tee % cd - ^foo^bar mtr google.com cp filename{,.bak} ctrl-x e $ssh-copy-id user@host > file.txt <space>command ffmpeg -f x11grab -s wxga -r 25 -i :0.0 -sameq /tmp/out.mpg reset ssh -N -L2001:localhost:80 somemachine echo "ls -l" | at midnight dig +short txt <keyword>.wp.dg.cx mount | column -t curl -u user:pass -d status="Tweeting from the shell" http://twitter.com/statuses/update.xml 'ALT+.' or '<ESC> .' dd if=/dev/dsp | ssh -c arcfour -C username@host dd of=/dev/dsp netstat -tlnp mount -t tmpfs tmpfs /mnt -o size=1024m sshfs name@server:/path/to/folder /path/to/mount/point !
